EmailTemplate.name: Modernizing School Media Centers
EmailTemplate.subject: Modernizing School Media Centers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Did you hear that Office Depot acquired CompuCom? Do you know what this can potentially mean for your business? This truly is a monumental move that brings all of the Tech products and services you need under one roof.
Please review the attached brochure for the details. I'll follow up in a few days to get your thoughts and to see when we can introduce our Technology Team.
Regards,
Steve Currier Major Account Manager|Office Depot, Inc. 774.826.8594 steve.currier@officedepot.com
